author: kristwaa
msg: DERBY-3309: Minor cleanups in ClientPooledConnection40 and ClientPooledConnection.
This patch fixes the broken synchronization of the list of connection event listeners, and also replaces the Vector with an ArrayList.

author: oysteing
msg: DERBY-3359: Make sure to initialize mf in constructor.

author: aidan
msg: Initialized merge tracking via "svnmerge" with revisions "1-615948" from

author: gsim
msg: Added a test (currently disabled) that highlights a deadlock in the client when commands are sent to the broker concurrently with acks (e.g. when the dispatcher thread is running with auto-acking and messages are sent on another thread).
